💡 Saving Tips

  • Include context: Copy the full conversation including your questions and AI responses
  • Add summaries: Brief summaries help with future searches
  • Use tags: Tags like "technical", "planning", "breakthrough" make conversations findable
  • Descriptive titles: Good titles help you recognize conversations later
  • Regular saving: Save important conversations immediately while they're fresh

📝 Formatting Examples

Claude: To build a persistent memory system for AI, you'll need several components:

1. Database backend (MariaDB or PostgreSQL)
2. API layer for saving/retrieving conversations
3. Authentication system for security
4. Web interface for human management
